title: Smart Data models - _3gpp-nr-nrm-danrmanagementfunction schema
description: Defines the YANG mapping of the DANRManagementFunction Information Object Class (IOC) that is part of the NR Network Resource Model (NRM).

intersystemANRManagementSwitch.description: This attribute determines whether the inter-system ANR function is activated or deactivated.

intrasystemANRManagementSwitch.description: This attribute determines whether the intra-system ANR function is activated or deactivated.
